Class MetisPreferenceManager

java.lang.Object
net.sourceforge.joceanus.metis.preference.MetisPreferenceManager
All Implemented Interfaces:

public class MetisPreferenceManager extends Object implements MetisFieldItem, OceanusEventRegistrar.OceanusEventProvider<MetisPreferenceEvent>
Manager class for preference sets.

Tony Washer
